title: Ranil’s ‘elephant symbol cant be dispensed with’ stance meets with stiff opposition; Sajith supports; Ravi ready to give away ‘Swan’
content: News Source: Lanka E news It is reported that the decision of the Opposition leader Ranil Wickremesinghe to contest the upcoming General election under the elephant symbol has raised a storm of stiff opposition from all quarters. All parties of the UNF alliance state that , at the recent Presidential election they contested under the…
